channel.title: Router Problem
channel.description:
Hi, i have satilite internet and im on a router wich basicly its like this Satilite > Satilite Router > My router.
And when i put in any ip i can find it never works, people can never connect yet on server status pages it says its online, can anyone help with this?
Satilite internet site: http://www.hughesnet.com
Thx for anyone that helps.[br][size=1]Posted at: August 12, 2006, 05:14:19 PM[/size][hr]Guess no one knows... :(

item.title: Router Problem
item.dc:creator: @supinhere supinhere
item.description:
@supinhere wrote:

ohh were is the allow list i dont find it

Read full topic

item.title: Router Problem
item.dc:creator: @Seemliss Seemliss
item.description:
@Seemliss wrote:

Ok, first of all, if you can edit your routers firewall settings, go in there. Add a definition (or some other name depending on your ISP) and name it RSserver. Then add the port from 43594 to 43594. If you ARE using no.ip then it should clear up your problem. NOTE After you add the definition, you must add it to the allow list. Then it should work

Read full topic
